root.name: sin()

example.code: a = 0.0 inc = TWO_PI/25.0 for i in range(0, 100, 4): line(i, 50, i, 50+sin(a)*40.0) a = a + inc

root.description: Calculates the sine of an angle. This function expects the values of the angle parameter to be provided in radians (values from 0 to 6.28). Values are returned in the range -1 to 1.
